summary: The module provides a Chinese grapheme‑to‑phoneme component that converts Mandarin characters into their pinyin pronunciations. It loads character‑to‑pinyin mappings, processes input text, applies case handling, and integrates with NeMo's TTS pipeline as a callable model.
business_intent: Enable accurate Mandarin speech synthesis by supplying phonetic (pinyin) representations of Chinese text for text‑to‑speech applications.
